ComicInfo.Summary:
Red Sonja has been wandering the world fighting evil. While she was wandering a man on a horse was attacked while screaming some non-sense. Red Sonja was able to defeat the attackers and the guy tells her he is a messenger. He then proceeds to tell her about his God, he then takes her along to go to the castle. While they were resting the guy is killed when a beast plant comes out of his mouth. She defeats it and heads towards the castle anyways. Once inside she argues with them and engages in a battle with an entire army.
